title: Error on windows server 2019
body:
Hi All,

thats what I'm facing with a web api deployed on windows server 2019:

that's my code:

![247130958-87f7ccca-78b0-4b2b-a0c5-a2dab4a6966d](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/assets/811725/0b150bd6-90ef-48e7-81e7-8561e7a01e5a)

same code runned in localhost works fine.

please, someone has any idea?

Many thanks
Mic
